meanings.definition: Not aligned or in agreement with a particular group or cause.
meanings.sent1: She felt unaligned with the rest of the team's decision.
meanings.sent2: The unaligned student chose to work independently on the project.
meanings.sent3: The unaligned cat refused to follow the other cats' lead.
meanings.sent4: His unaligned views on the topic made him stand out in the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The unaligned puzzle piece didn't fit with the others, just like her opinion.

meanings.definition: Not positioned or adjusted in a straight line or parallel with something else.
meanings.sent1: The unaligned books on the shelf looked messy.
meanings.sent2: The unaligned picture frame needed to be straightened.
meanings.sent3: The unaligned traffic cones confused the drivers.
meanings.sent4: Her unaligned bangs covered one eye, giving her a unique look.
meanings.sent5: The unaligned rows of chairs made the room feel disorganized.
